ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters and Research (Bersker Str)
ygData.msgSnippet: It s unfortunate that people like this have to post.  It is one thing to complain and vent, we all need to do this at times. Its another to be completely rude
ygData.messageBody:
It's unfortunate that people like this have to post. It is one thing
to complain and vent, we all need to do this at times. Its another to
be completely rude and insulting. Guess that makes my vote for moderation
a yes.


On Fri, 21 May 1999 16:36:00 PDT, Ryo-ohki informed me that
"Jeff Zoch" wrote:
*
* I have one thing to say. You're a dumbass. If you can't get to level 9
* from 8 in 20 hours you're a friggin moron. My magician got from level 1-25
* in exactly 10 days of playing
